    Posted: October 25, 2020 |
    By under


    PART ONE: HAVING FAITH IN GRAND DREAMS. Understanding the why of the work is the most important thing that’s needed when starting out. It’s so easy to become discouraged when you’re in the the thick of the weeds, when you need to do difficult or tedious. Motivation and discipline to do such work comes from having a bigger picture — a purpose. This purpose comes from a place of realistic optimi...

    Posted: October 1, 2019 |
    By under


    In this project, the accelerator and the LEDs were peripherals that shared the same I2C bus for communication. The Accelerator movement in x-y-z directions lit rgb respectively. Initially the code used Busy-Wait for the accelerator which prevents the CPU from doing other tasks, thus the efficiency of operation is compromised initially.Initial code uses Busy-Wait which prevents the CPU from doi...
